subject: Greetings,
body:
Greetings,
My name is Rahim OLAWOLE, and I am employed at SGB Bank (Société Générale du Bénin) as the director of international transfers. I have a foreign client who passed away in 2014 and had a considerable sum of money in the bank. Since their death, no one has come forward to claim this money, and there are no details regarding their family in the account opening records. After taking the necessary precautions, I am searching for a responsible person outside my country to act as a representative of the account so that these funds can be legally transferred to them, and then we will share the funds. Once we receive a favorable response, I will send you all the details and the procedure to follow to successfully complete this operation. My direct email address: 
rahimiolawole@gmail.com
Best regards... Mr. Rahim OLAWOLE

subject: Re: Greetings,
body:
Hello Mr. Rahim OLAWOLE,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this intriguing proposition. I must say, it's not every day that one receives such an interesting email.

I'm curious about a few things though. How did you come across my contact information? And why have you chosen me specifically for this operation? 

Also, could you please provide more details about the procedure involved in completing this operation? I would like to understand better what my role would be in all of this.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Mike

subject: Re: Greetings,
body:
Hello my dear,

Thank you for this positive response to my confidential request for
cooperation, for which I have already made all the necessary arrangements.

In fact, I am the manager of the deceased client's account since its
opening in our bank and the only person who is aware of all the information
regarding this account. There is no reason for me to be the beneficiary of
this account, as I am looking for a reliable, very discreet, and
responsible person to whom I will transfer the information of the
deceased's agent. In return, this person will receive 40% of the funds.

If you agree to a frank and sincere cooperation, please send me the
following information:

Last Name:
First Name:
Nationality:
Occupation:
Country and Address:
Phone Number:

This transaction requires mutual trust and complete discretion. Please be
aware that this matter will only last for a week or two if you follow my
instructions.

Note: The current balance of the account is €5,860,000, and you will also
understand that we must maintain confidentiality in this case until the
funds are transferred to your bank account.

Sincerely,
Rahim O

subject: Re: Greetings,
body:
Hello Rahim,

Thank you for your detailed message. It's quite an interesting situation you've described there. I must admit, I'm not very familiar with these types of transactions. Could you perhaps explain a bit more about how this process works? 

Also, could you clarify what exactly my role would be in this? You mentioned that the person involved will receive some funds - how much are we talking about here?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Mike

subject: Re: Greetings,
body:
The current balance of the account is €5,860,000, and you will also
understand that we must maintain confidentiality in this case until the
funds are transferred to your bank account.
 Best wishes
Rahimi .O

body:

Thank you for your message. I'm a bit confused about the details though. Could you please clarify what you mean by maintaining the current balance of the account? And how exactly will these funds be transferred to my bank account?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Mike

leave.
Since then I have sent you information that you had to pass on to me so
that I can begin the procedures for the transfer.

body:

Could you please elaborate more on the matter at hand? What exactly does it entail and how can I be of help? You mentioned a timeline of a week or two, could you explain why this specific timeframe?

body:

body:

Best wishes,
Mike

subject: Hello my dear
body:
Hello my dear
 I came to give you this message with more details as well as the procedure
to follow.

First of all, I would like you to understand how important this transaction
is to me. Because I had to take a loan from a bank to build my house and
now at the end of every month the bank deducts my salary and what comes to
me can barely support my family, that's why When this opportunity presented
itself to me, I took all my time to think better and analyze everything
before starting to look for an honest person to collaborate with outside of
my country.

Here are the account details:
NAME: RICHARD
FIRST NAME: JEAN-PIERRE ROLAND
French nationality
ACCOUNT OPENING DATE: February 18, 1998
DATE OF BIRTH: September 16, 1948 in PUTEAUX, France
CURRENT AMOUNT IN ACCOUNT: $6,370,000
HOME: Accra, Ghana

The procedure to follow :

1/ You will send me a copy of your passport so that I can modify the
documents on your behalf as the legal beneficiary. Once the documents are
in your name, you will officially be considered the agent and legal
beneficiary of the account in the eyes of the bank and the supervisory
authorities. Then I will send you a copy which you will keep jealousy
without disclosing it because to succeed, discretion and mutual trust are
necessary.

2/ Then, you will either have the choice to come here to Accra, Ghana so
that I can accompany you in the administrative procedures to complete the
formalities so that the funds are transferred to your account abroad. This
will allow you to see the transaction clearly.

3/In the event that you cannot come here, you will have to be represented
at the bank by a lawyer competent here in matters of inheritance. For this
reason, I will go through the list of lawyers and find the right one to
represent you at the bank.

Once the lawyer has been found, I will send you his contact details as well
as the letter to send to him. The lawyer must never know that it is someone
from the bank who is giving you information. For this, I will send you the
letter to address to the lawyer.

Looking forward to hearing from you, receive my most sincere and deepest
greetings.
Sincerely…

subject: Re: Hello my dear
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this information with me. I can understand how important this is to you, and I appreciate your trust in seeking an honest person to assist you.

However, I have a few questions that I would like to clarify before we proceed further. Could you please explain more about the role of the agent and legal representative? What exactly will be my responsibilities?

Also, could you provide more details about the procedures that need to be completed at the bank? And what kind of lawyer should I be looking for?

I'm sorry if my questions seem too many or too detailed. As a person who's not very familiar with these matters, I just want to make sure that I fully understand everything.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Mike

subject: Re: Hello my dear
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this information with me. It sounds like a very interesting opportunity, but I must admit, I'm not entirely clear on all the details. Could you perhaps explain it to me in simpler terms? 

Also, I'm curious about the process of modifying documents on my behalf. How exactly does that work? And what kind of documents are we talking about here?

I also have some questions about the role of the lawyer in this process. What exactly will their responsibilities be? And why is it important that they don't know someone from the bank is giving me information?

I look forward to hearing more about this.

Best wishes,
Mike

subject: Re: Hello my dear
body:
Bonjour

La procédure à suivre :

1/ Vous m’enverrez une copie de votre passeport afin que je puisse modifier
les documents en votre nom en tant que le bénéficiaire légal. Une fois les
documents en votre nom, vous serez considéré officiellement le mandataire
et le bénéficiaire légal du compte au vu de la banque et les autorités de
tutelle. Ensuite je vous enverrai une copie sur vous que vous allez garder
jalousement sans le divulguer car pour la bonne réussite, il faut une
discrétion et une confiance mutuelle.

2/ Ensuite, vous aurez soit le choix de venir ici au Ghana ainsi je
pourrais vous assister auprès de l’administration pour remplir les
formalités pour que les fonds soient transférés sur votre compte à
l’étranger. Ce qui vous permettra de voir clair dans la transaction.

3/Dans le cas où vous ne pouvez pas venir ici, il va falloir que vous soyez
représenté auprès de la banque par un avocat compétent dans les domaines de
succession ici. Pour ce fait, je vais voir dans la liste des avocats et
trouvez celui qui est doué afin qu’il vous représente auprès de la banque.

Une fois l’avocat trouvé, je vous enverrai son contact ainsi que la lettre
à lui adresser. L’avocat ne doit jamais savoir que c’est quelqu’un de la
banque qui vous donne des informations. Pour ce, je vous enverrai la lettre
à adresser à l’avocat.

Maintenant dites moi que voulez vous comprendre?

Dans l’attente de vous lire recevez mes sincères et profondes salutations
les plus distinguées.
Cordialement…

subject: Re: Hello my dear
body:
Bonjour! Merci pour votre message détaillé. C'est une procédure intéressante que vous avez là. J'ai quelques questions, si vous me le permettez.

D'abord, pourquoi est-ce nécessaire d'envoyer une copie de mon passeport? Est-ce une exigence standard pour ce genre de processus?

Deuxièmement, vous mentionnez la possibilité de venir au Ghana pour remplir les formalités. Quelles sont exactement ces formalités?

Enfin, concernant l'avocat qui me représentera auprès de la banque, comment puis-je être sûr qu'il est compétent et digne de confiance?

Je suis désolé si mes questions semblent naïves. Je suis nouveau dans ce genre de choses et j'essaie juste de comprendre tout cela. Merci encore pour votre patience et votre aide.

Best wishes,
Mike

subject: Re: Hello my dear
body:
Pour vous répondre :
 Nous avons d'abord besoin de votre passeport pour changer le document
attestation de dépôt de fonds à votre nom en tant que Bénéficiaire Légal de
Monsieur Jean-Pierre RICHARD.
 Deuxièmement, si je vous demande de venir au Ghana, c'est pour voir la
véracité de notre affaire.
Troisièmement, concernant l'avocat, ce n'est pas la première fois que je
travaille avec lui, vous pouvez donc lui faire confiance.

subject: Re: Hello my dear
body:
Bonjour, merci pour votre message. C'est intéressant ce que vous dites à propos de Monsieur Richard et du document de fonds. Pourriez-vous m'en dire plus sur la nature de cette affaire? Et pourquoi est-ce nécessaire de venir au Ghana?

En ce qui concerne l'avocat, c'est rassurant de savoir que vous avez travaillé avec lui auparavant. Quel genre de travail a-t-il fait pour vous dans le passé?

Best wishes,
Mike

subject: Re: Hello my dear
body:
Que veux-tu que je te dise d'autre ? J'ai dit qu'il y a un client qui a une
somme ici dans notre banque et que ce dernier est décédé depuis 2014 donc
je recherche quelqu'un hors d'Afrique à qui transférer cette somme et
ensuite nous la partagerons à parts égales.
Non, vous n'avez pas forcément besoin de vous déplacer et concernant
l'avocat, j'ai géré un dossier comme celui que je vous propose dans le
passé.

body:

Best wishes,
